Author: Beatrix ICO
Title: [ANN][PRE-SALE]BEATRīX ICO: THE FIRST GREEN ENERGY TOKENIZATION
Body: Dear Beatrixians,  Due to the recent crash of the crypto markets, we are going through a tough time to realize the funds required to meet the milestones for our project. Because of this sudden and unpredictable crash, the funds we raised during the pre-sale were not enough to meet our milestones. We are trying to compensate for this shortfall with the help of private investments which is obviously taking time and a lot of effort.  However if we cannot manage to get private investments within the next 7 days and the crypto markets fail to recover sustainably, we will be forced to reimburse all the investments that we received during our pre-sale. This would also mean that the start of our project will be delayed until the markets have recovered and stabilized.  We are very enthusiastic and are not going to stop working towards our goals for a sustainable and greener future.  https://ibb.co/iOdXS9

ATB Coin is a full-scale investment platform capable of organizing financial assets using the world’s most secure and reliable payment system. The coin uses advanced technological capabilities of SegWit, Lightning Network, Smart Contracts and Cloud Mining to deliver fast, secure and near-zero cost payments for users, investors, and business owners. Author: Beatrix ICO
Title: [ANN][PRE-SALE]BEATRīX ICO: THE FIRST GREEN ENERGY TOKENIZATION
Body: BEATRĪX is excited to welcome Thomas Enechi as an Advisor  Thomas is a Co-Founder, ICO Investorand a Blockchain Advisor. He holds a M.Sc. in Information Technology, a First Degree in Electrical and Electronics Engineering as well as a Telecoms Mini-MBA from Informa Telecoms and Technology Academy, United Kingdom. He is a Blockchain enthusiast and a Cryptocurrency investor, with about 15 years of extensive experience in the Telecommunication and Information Technology industries both in Nigeria and abroad.  Thomas is the Chief Operating Officer of LIFTIX LLC; a Blockchain StartUp based in Lagos, Nigeria, owners of the VITR Identity Verification Network (VTK). A Blockchain Advisor to ENDO Blockchain Protocol based in Singapore, Member of the Board of Directors at International Decentralized Association of Cryptocurrency and Blockchain — IDACB and Country Manager, European Chamber of Distributed Ledger Technologies and Cryptocurrencies — EUCC.  Thomas’ vast experience, his advice and assistance will be an exceptional benefit for BEATRĪX and will be a great aid in merging more and more with the African community as well as the crypto-currency world. We are delighted to have you on board.  LinkedIn Profil: https://www.linkedin.com/in/chitom/  https://ibb.co/jOkpLz

Author: Beatrix ICO
Title: [ANN][PRE-SALE]BEATRīX ICO: THE FIRST GREEN ENERGY TOKENIZATION
Body: BEATRĪX is a green, low-cost and sustainable energy project aiming to resolve the energy and telecommunication deficiencies across Africa. The proposed solution is to build decentralized energy towers using buoyancy technology that efficiently produces green electricity. The towers are distributed all over the continent through our Decentralized Energy and Telecommunication Distribution (DETD) eco-system. Our eco-system is powered by cooperation of German and Swiss companies. The generated energy is stored in the RĪX token which is a fully ERC-20 compliant Ethereum utility token. It will be the only form of payment required for the energy that BEATRĪX will generate. RĪX is the first and only energy based token that is purely green and self generated, making it independent of third party providers.  Like our page and follow us to stay updated on our Pre-Sale that started on 18.07.2018.  We have already raised 1.5 million $US in less than 24 hours.  We also have a Bounty program, for more details please visit https://bounty.beatrix.social  Watch our bounty promotional video here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CMFLbrXQ7yk  For more details and sign up, please visit our website at https://beatrix.social/  What is BEATRĪX? Watch here - https://youtu.be/T4NszubtFVY  https://ibb.co/mUF3My  https://ibb.co/bF9kZJ

Author: Beatrix ICO
Title: [ANN][PRE-SALE]BEATRīX ICO: THE FIRST GREEN ENERGY TOKENIZATION
Body: Hi Trns.txt, thank u for the gratulations regarding the achievement, but it all goes down to the people believing in our cause and showing their support, we are very thankful to them. May I please correct u regarding the numbers, it was 1,5 in the first 48 hrs and 1,7 in the first 4 days. Privat sale was at the 11.07.18 until the 18.07.18, this amount is not in the number mentioned above. U can just recheck it yourself at our announcements.
